data.message:
Thank you for info. Facebook, I've got a question for you, I saw another post , that said that the shared post was a hoax, n I shared that to my friends, couple of minutes later, I saw my post had been dimished n in the same post was the , " it's official.... Post, I'm hoping that I caught it right away n deleted it, am I safe?
By the way, I , too am grateful for Facebook, it keeps me in touch with loved ones n friends

replies.message: Thanks for checking, Lucy! You're in control of what you share.  You can learn more here: http://on.fb.me/Privacy-Basics-Posts -Liz
Thank you :), Facebook has been very useful for a lot of ppl, n especially for me, thank you from a loyal customer (Y)
If she's in control how the heck did that happen to her?Removing her 'it's a hoax' post & putting the 'it's official' post up in its place?Very weird.

Good question, I did post it's a hoax thing, and who ever did dimished the post I shared AND, is the same post was the " it's official", unless the post I shared was also a hoax?...n what happened to ppl who shared " the hoax" post?
